name: Clusterfire Classic
description:
Clusterfire is a Bullet Hell Game Where you can Connect yourself with Bullets and Kill Enemies with the.

Use WASD or the Arrow key to navigate the Menu. Press B to go back and SPACE to select.

Use WASD to move around the playing field and Press SPACE to Connect yourself with the Bullets Near you. Rotate them with the Arrow keys and Kill Enemies with them. They can Harm you and might turn Red, Indicating that they can only Harm you and can't be Controlled

I hope you will enjoy Clusterfire!
